description.fr: Vaincre tous les Taures. \--- {%FightStarted} Les héros deviennent {LinkEffect:3,plural:other} du {Companion:1894!}. \--- {%FightTurnStarted} Applique MARQUÉ\_ à un Taure aléatoire.
description.en: Defeat all the Taurs. \--- {%FightStarted} The heroes become {LinkEffect:3,plural:other} for the {Companion:1894!}. \--- {%FightTurnStarted} Applies MARKED\_ on a random Taur.
description.es: Vencer a todos los toros. \--- {%FightStarted} Los héroes se vuelven {LinkEffect:3,plural:other} del {Companion:1894!}. \--- {%FightTurnStarted} Aplica MARCADO\_ a un toro aleatorio.
description.de: Alle Tauren besiegen. \--- {%FightStarted} Die Helden werden zu {LinkEffect:3,plural:other} von {Companion:1894!}. \--- {%FightTurnStarted} Wendet MARKIERT\_ bei einem zufälligen Tauren an.
description.pt: Derrotar todos os Tauros. \--- {%FightStarted} Os heróis viram {LinkEffect:3,plural:other} do {Companion:1894!}. \--- {%FightTurnStarted} Aplica MARCADO\_ a um Tauro aleatório.
